articles.title: Apple’s Mac turns 40, bringing back memories of the company’s once-renegade ways
articles.content: As Apple nears the 40th anniversary of one of its most groundbreaking products ever, the Macintosh, it is also a reminder to investors that the company that revolutionized the personal computer is now a middle-aged tech giant.

articles.title: Netflix’s ever-shifting content model now includes live sports and more gaming
articles.content: Netflix "will continue to maintain a healthy blend of licensed titles and original series," co-CEO Ted Sarandos says.

articles.title: Apple said to be scaling down self-driving Apple car features
articles.content: Apple has switched to developing a car with basic self-driving features, more in line with Tesla's features.

articles.title: ASML Holding (ASML) to Post Q4 Earnings: What's in the Cards?
articles.content: ASML Holding's (ASML) fourth-quarter results are likely to reflect benefits from strong momentum across EUV and DUV systems amid macroeconomic headwinds.

articles.title: Here’s what big consumer-sentiment gains mean for the stock market — and this one is unusual

articles.title: 3 Blue-Chip Stocks to Buy as the Dow Breezes Past 38,000
